title: Three Rivers Market
description: A community-owned co-operative grocery market providing natural and bulk food, organic fruit and vegetable, natural health and body care, and more. Features a hot food bar and salad bar with daily changing menus, and many vegetarian/vegan options. Seating is available both inside and outside, and an on-site permit means you can also enjoy a craft beer with your meal. Dogs are welcome to sit with their owners on the side patio. Accepts EBT/SNAP.
